data.title: Protection from Violence or Abuse
data.meta_description: Arkansas Law Help: Protection from Violence or Abuse: Domestic Violence Shelters
data.text:
Below, is a list of domestic violence shelters in Arkansas organized alphabetically according to county.

For more assistance with locating a shelter, contact the Arkansas Coalition Against Domestic Violence at 1-800-269-4668. There are differences between these organizations. You may find some of them helpful and others not helpful. If the organization nearest you is not helpful, try calling another one.

If you do not find what you need on this page, please call the National Domestic Violence Hotline for referrals and support:

1-800-799-SAFE (1-800-799-7233)

TTY: 1-800-787-3224
